#summary Image preloading with Core Framework

= Introduction =

Core Framework utilizes fast algorithm for preloading images in parallel, thus reducing the response time of an application.


= Preloading images =
Example of image preloading with Core Framework:
{{{
Core.preloader.queue(
[
	'../../../../explorer/1.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/2.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/3.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/4.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/5.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/6.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/7.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/8.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/9.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/10.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/11.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/22.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/13.jpg',
	'../../../../explorer/14.jpg'
]).preload(function(ui)
{
	alert('All loaded in ' + ui.time + ' sec.');
})
}}}
